name: Spirous
description:
To make working with spirographs fun again and usable in UI designs, we at Zeta built spirous which can mathematically generate beautiful vectors with desired shape, color, stroke width and insert them on the Figma artboard.


Here's what the plugin offers you: 


  • Hand-picked templates to try out
  • Customise spirograph based on color, stroke width and other config options
  • Insert spirograph directly in the art board by clicking anywhere on the preview panel
  • Create and save custom spirographs
  • Feature to randomise spirograph config for generating new patterns


First-time plugin usage:


  • Run the Spirous plugin
  • Choose from hand-picked templates
  • Select the template you like
  • Insert selected template by clicking anywhere on preview panel
  • That's it!! Now use the beautiful Spirograph in your designs
